attributes.action: Recognise 34 veterans of VJ Day in honours list
attributes.additional_details:
Campaign starts here as far as I am concerned. 

Each of the 34 veterans surviving VJ Day should receive recognition by HMGovernment in the very next honours list.

If you agree please forward nationwide in the hope decision makers take notice.

We will remember them
attributes.background:

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away.
